mapper.select: SELECT DBMS_QRY_HIST_ID , PROC_ID , REQ_ID , ORG_QRY_CONT , EXEC_QRY_CONT , PROC_MS , REG_DTTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , UPD_DTTM , UPD_USR_ID , UPD_USR_IP FROM USTRA_DBMS_QRY_HIST WHERE PROC_ID = #{procId} AND REQ_ID = #{reqId}

SELECT DBMS_QRY_HIST_ID , PROC_ID , REQ_ID , ORG_QRY_CONT , EXEC_QRY_CONT , PROC_MS , REG_DTTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , UPD_DTTM , UPD_USR_ID , UPD_USR_IP FROM USTRA_DBMS_QRY_HIST WHERE PROC_ID = #{procId} AND REQ_ID = #{reqId}
